definition: to incite or rouse as if with a goad (see goad entry 2 sense 2a)
examples: was goaded into fighting with another player

definition: to drive (an animal) with a goad (see goad entry 2 sense 1)
a pointed rod used to urge on an animal
something that urges or stimulates into action : spur
examples: The accident has been a goad to the company to improve its safety record.

definition: something that pains as if by pricking : thorn
